sQuestion: Mary went to the mall . She spent $ 13.04 on a shirt and $ 12.27 on a jacket . She went to 2 shops . In total , how much money did Mary spend on clothing ?
Dan joined his school 's band . He bought a clarinet for $ 130.30 , and a song book which was $ 11.24 . Dan found $ 12.32 in his pocket . How much did Dan spend at the music store ?
Tom bought a skateboard for $ 9.46 , and spent $ 9.56 on marbles . Tom also spent $ 14.50 on shorts . In total , how much did Tom spend on toys ?
Mary got fast food for lunch . Mary spent $ 1.08 on soup and $ 4.80 on a salad . Mary paid with a 20 dollar bill . What was the total of the lunch bill ?
For his car , Mike spent $ 118.54 on speakers and $ 106.33 on new tires . Mike wanted 3 CD 's for $ 4.58 but decided not to . In total , how much did Mike spend on car parts ?
Tom purchased a Batman game for $ 13.60 , and a Superman game for $ 5.06 . Tom already owns 2 games . How much did Tom spend on video games ?
Joan spent $ 15 on shorts and $ 14.82 on a jacket , and $ 12.51 on a shirt . She went to 3 shops . In total , how much money did Joan spend on clothing ?

Joan joined her school 's band . She bought a trumpet for $ 149.16 , a music tool for $ 9.98 , and a song book which was $ 4.14 . Joan found $ 8.65 in her pocket . How much did Joan spend at the music store ?
Melanie bought a Batman game for $ 6.95 , a strategy game for $ 7.90 , and a Superman game for $ 7.73 . Melanie already owns 4 games . How much did Melanie spend on video games ?
Keith spent $ 6.51 on a rabbit toy , $ 5.79 on pet food , and a cage cost him $ 12.51 . He found a dollar bill on the ground . What was the total cost of Keith 's purchases ?
Keith spent $ 136.01 on speakers , $ 139.38 on a CD player , and $ 112.46 on new tires . He wanted 3 CD 's for $ 6.16 , but did n't buy them . In total , how much did he spend ?
Joan bought toy cars for $ 14.88 , a skateboard for $ 4.88 , and got toy trucks for $ 5.86 . She spent $ 14.55 on pants . In total , how much did Joan spend on toys ?
After paying 6 dollars for the pie , Mary has 52 dollars , her friend has 43 dollars . How much money did she have before buying the pie ?
There were 46 bales of hay in the barn and 32 bales in the shed . Tom stacked bales in the barn today . There are now 60 bales of hay in the barn . How many bales did he store in the barn ?
Mary is baking a cake . The recipe calls for 7 cups of flour and 3 cups of sugar . She already put in 2 cups of flour . How many cups of flour does she need to add ?
Last week Fred had 23 dollars and Jason had 46 dollars . Fred washed cars over the weekend and now has 86 dollars . How much money did Fred make washing cars ?

There are 31 short trees and 32 tall trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant short trees today . When the workers are finished there will be 95 short trees in the park . How many short trees did the workers plant today ?
There were 9 red orchids and 3 white orchids in the vase . Sally cut some red orchids from her flower garden . There are now 15 red orchids in the vase . How many red orchids did she cut ?
Sara had 24 peaches and 37 pears at her fruit dish . She went to the orchard and picked peaches . There are now 61 peaches . how many did she pick ?
Joan found 72 seashells and 12 starfishes on the beach . She gave Alyssa some of her seashells . She has 28 seashell . How many seashells did she give to Alyssa ?
There are 6 pencils and 7 rulers in the drawer . Benny placed 3 pencils in the drawer . How many pencils are now there in total ?
Sara has 3 green and 5 red marbles . Tom has 4 green marbles . How many green marbles do they have in total ?
Joan grew 8 watermelons and 4 turnips . Tom grew 9 watermelons . How many watermelons did they grow in total ?
There are 2 maple trees and 5 popular trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant 9 maple trees today . How many maple trees will the park have when the workers are finished ?
Mary found 2 seashells and Keith found 5 seashells on the beach . When they cleaned them , they discovered that 9 were cracked . How many seashells did they find together ?
Mike picked 8 pears and Jason picked 7 pears from the pear tree . Fred picked 6 apples from the apple tree . How many pears were picked in total ?
Tim had 7 quarters and 9 nickels in his bank . His dad gave him 3 nickels and 5 pennies . How many nickels does Tim have now ?
A restaurant served 7 slices of pie during lunch and 5 during dinner today . It served 8 of them yesterday . How many slices of pie were served today ?
Tom went to 4 hockey games this year , but missed 7 . He went to 9 games last year . How many hockey games did Tom go to in all ?
Sam 's dog had puppies and 8 had spots . He gave 2 to his friends . He now has 6 puppies . How many puppies did he have to start with ?
Mike picked 7 apples , Nancy picked 3 apples , and Keith picked 6 apples and 4 pears , at the farm . How many apples were picked in total ?

There are 7 dogwood trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant 5 dogwood trees today and 4 dogwood trees tomorrow . It took 8 workers to finish the work . How many dogwood trees will the park have when the workers are finished ?
Dan 's cat had kittens and 5 had spots . He gave 7 to Tim and 4 to Jason . He now has 5 kittens . How many kittens did he have to start with ?
There are 7 crayons in the drawer and 6 crayons on the desk . Sam placed 4 crayons and 8 scissors on the desk . How many crayons are now there in total ?
Sally had 8 pennies and 7 nickels in her bank . Her dad gave her 9 nickels and her mother gave her 2 nickels . How many nickels does Sally have now ?
Nancy went to 9 football games this month . She went to 8 games last month , and plans to go to 7 games next month . She paid 3 dollars for the tickets . How many games will she attend in all ?

Keith found 6 seashells , Jessica found 8 seashells , and Tim found 7 seashells on the beach . When they cleaned them , they discovered that 3 were cracked . How many seashells did they find together ?
Nancy grew 2 onions , Dan grew 9 onions , and Mike grew 4 onions . They worked for 6 days on the farm . How many onions did they grow in total ?
Fred has 5 yellow balloons , Sam has 6 yellow balloons , and Mary has 7 yellow balloons . The balloons cost 5 dollars . How many yellow balloons do they have in total ?
A restaurant served 4 pies during lunch and 9 during dinner today . The restaurant served 7 pies and 2 pizzas yesterday . How many pies were served in total ?
Tim found 37 seashells and Sally found 13 seashells on the beach . When they cleaned them , they discovered that 25 were cracked . How many seashells did they find together ?
Tom had 27 pennies and 15 dimes in his bank . His dad gave him 33 dimes and 49 nickels . How many dimes does he have now ?
There are 39 scissors and 22 pencils in the drawer . Dan placed 13 scissors in the drawer . How many scissors are now there in total ?
Sam has 16 blue and 25 green balloons . Alyssa has 21 blue balloons . How many blue balloons do they have in all ?
There are 22 orchid bushes and 40 orange trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant 13 orchid bushes today . How many orchid bushes will the park have when the workers are finished ?
Mary had 33 Pokemon cards , and 6 were torn . Sam gave Mary 23 new Pokemon cards . How many Pokemon cards does Mary have now ?
Mary picked 14 oranges and Jason picked 41 oranges . Keith picked 38 apples . How many oranges were picked in all ?
Jason grew 37 watermelons and 30 pumpkins . Sandy grew 11 watermelons . How many watermelons did they grow in total ?
Mike went to 15 basketball games this year , but missed 41 . He went to 39 games last year . How many basketball games did Mike go to in total ?
Melanie had 10 quarters and 17 pennies in her bank . Her dad gave her 27 pennies and her mother gave her 19 pennies . How many pennies does Melanie have now ?
Joan grew 24 pumpkins , Keith grew 42 pumpkins , and Alyssa grew 13 pumpkins . They worked for 34 days on the farm . How many pumpkins did they grow in all ?
Mary had 18 baseball cards , and 8 were torn . Fred gave Mary 26 new baseball cards . Mary bought 40 baseball cards . How many baseball cards does Mary have now ?
Alyssa went to 11 soccer games this year , but missed 12 . She went to 13 games last year and plans to go to 15 games next year . How many soccer games will Alyssa go to in all ?
There are 48 erasers in the drawer and 30 erasers on the desk . Alyssa placed 39 erasers and 45 rulers on the desk . How many erasers are now there in total ?

There are 47 orchid bushes currently in the park . Park workers will plant 37 orchid bushes today and 25 orchid bushes tomorrow . It took 35 workers to finish the work . How many orchid bushes will the park have when the workers are finished ?
Fred has 10 red balloons , Sam has 46 red balloons , and Dan has 16 red balloons . The balloons cost 10 dollars . How many red balloons do they have in all ?

Mary found 45 seashells , Melanie found 23 seashells , and Jason found 32 seashells on the beach . When they cleaned them , they discovered that 31 were cracked . How many seashells did they find together ?
Fred picked 36 limes , Alyssa picked 32 limes , and Nancy picked 35 limes and 18 pears , at the farm . How many limes were picked in total ?

Benny received 79 dollars and 9 movie tickets for his birthday . He went to a sporting goods store and bought a baseball glove , baseball , and bat . He had 32 dollars over , how much did he spent on the baseball gear ?

There are 43 maple trees and 22 orange trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant maple trees today . When the workers are finished there will be 54 maple trees in the park . How many maple trees did the workers plant today ?
Dan had 14 peaches and 10 pears at his roadside fruit dish . He went to the orchard and picked peaches to stock up . There are now 85 peaches . how many did he pick ?
Melanie has 41 books and 31 magazines in her library . She bought several books at a yard sale over the weekend . She now has 87 books in her library . How many books did she buy at the yard sale ?
There were 2 red orchids and 4 white orchids in the vase . Jessica cut some red orchids from her flower garden . There are now 18 red orchids in the vase . How many red orchids did she cut ?
Last week Tim had 12 dollars and Keith had 36 dollars . Tim washed cars over the weekend and now has 75 dollars . How much money did Tim make washing cars ?
Joan found 75 seashells and 14 starfishes on the beach . She gave Tim some of her seashells . She has 62 seashell . How many seashells did she give to Tim ?
There were 32 bales of hay in the barn and 26 bales in the shed . Jason stacked bales in the barn today . There are now 98 bales of hay in the barn . How many bales did he store in the barn ?
Jessica is baking a cake . The recipe calls for 8 cups of flour and 2 cups of sugar . She already put in 4 cups of flour . How many cups of flour does she need to add ?
Keith picked 3 pears and Jason picked 2 pears from the pear tree . Joan picked 5 apples from the apple tree . How many pears were picked in total ?
Sally has 9 orange balloons and 4 blue balloons . She lost 2 of the orange balloons . How many orange balloons does Sally have now ?
Sandy grew 8 carrots and 7 turnips . Mary grew 6 carrots . How many carrots did they grow in all ?
There are 5 scissors and 3 pencils in the drawer . Jason placed 4 scissors in the drawer . How many scissors are now there in total ?
Alyssa 's cat had 8 kittens and 8 had spots . She gave 4 to her friends . How many kittens does she now have ?
Sam had 7 pennies and 8 dimes in his bank . His sister borrowed 4 dimes . How many dimes does Sam have now ?
A restaurant served 9 hot dogs during lunch and 2 during dinner today . It served 5 of them yesterday . How many hot dogs were served today ?
There are 3 short trees and 6 tall trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant 9 short trees today . How many short trees will the park have when the workers are finished ?
Mary had 21 dimes and 38 pennies in her bank . Her dad borrowed 18 pennies from Mary . How many pennies does she have now ?
Alyssa picked 17 plums and Jason picked 10 plums . Melanie picked 35 pears . How many plums were picked in all ?
There are 48 pencils and 40 scissors in the drawer . Joan placed 29 pencils in the drawer . How many pencils are now there in all ?
There are 37 short bushes and 30 tall trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant 20 short bushes today . How many short bushes will the park have when the workers are finished ?
